desc: I've always been an artist. Whether it was writing a song or drawing as a kid. My love for anime began as a teen then developing a fascination with so many that I would adore.

layout.text: I've always been an artist. Whether it was writing a song or drawing as a kid. My love for anime began as a teen then developing a fascination with so many that I would adore. Of course there are other interests of mine and I figured why not get creative. Hope you enjoy our selection and continue to follow our anime chique way.
